Post_Process package¶

Submodules¶

Post_Process.lib_plot module¶

class Post_Process.lib_plot.Plot(geo1, geo2, A, writer, fig)[source]¶

Bases: openmdao.core.component.Component

OpenMDAO component for post-processing - Movie writing DOES NOT work on CAEN linux - Plots aircraft:

  • During each iteration and at the end (plotGeoFinal)
  • Plots wing (blue) and tail (red)
  • Plots CG (black) and NP (light blue - cyan)
  • Includes configuration number (fig)
Aircraft_Class: class
in_aircraft class (now has data from upstream components)

Plots

solve_nonlinear(params, unknowns, resids)[source]¶
Post_Process.lib_plot.plotGeoFinal(Xle, Yle, C, Xle_ht, Yle_ht, C_t, x_cg, NP, score, mount_len)[source]¶

Plots the final optimized geometry

Xle: Wing leading edge at each section (x coord.) Yle: Wing leading edge at each section (y coord.) C: Chord at each section Xle_ht: Tail leading edge at each section (x coord.) Yle_ht: Tail leading edge at each section (y coord.) C_t: Tail chord at each section x_cg: CG position NP: Neutral point position Score: Objective function score mount_len: Motor mount length to plot the motor

Single plot

Post_Process.lib_plot.plotGeoFinalDuo(in_AC, out_AC)[source]¶
